Package edu.cornell.gdiac.physics.obstacle

Class WheelObstacle

java.lang.Object
edu.cornell.gdiac.physics.obstacle.Obstacle
edu.cornell.gdiac.physics.obstacle.SimpleObstacle
edu.cornell.gdiac.physics.obstacle.WheelObstacle
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bubblegum
public class WheelObstacle extends SimpleObstacle
Circle-shaped model to support collisions. Unless otherwise specified, the center of mass is as the center.

  • Constructor Details

    • WheelObstacle

      public WheelObstacle(float radius)
      Creates a new circle at the origin. The size is expressed in physics units NOT pixels. In order for drawing to work properly, you MUST set the drawScale. The drawScale converts the physics units to pixels.
      Parameters:
      radius - The wheel radius

    • WheelObstacle

      public WheelObstacle(float x, float y, float radius)
      Creates a new circle object. The size is expressed in physics units NOT pixels. In order for drawing to work properly, you MUST set the drawScale. The drawScale converts the physics units to pixels.
      Parameters:
      x - Initial x position of the circle center
      y - Initial y position of the circle center
      radius - The wheel radius

    • drawDebug

      public void drawDebug(GameCanvas canvas)
      Draws the outline of the physics body. This method can be helpful for understanding issues with collisions.
      Specified by:
      drawDebug in class Obstacle
      Parameters:
      canvas - Drawing context
